name: Last Player Survival
description:
You are racing against enemies shooting and death chasing.

You have to fight for yourself & survival. You are a solo solider of your entire army who left alone now. You have to defeat the enemies alone. Step onto the battlefield, War has evolved & kill your companions with great strategy. Stop foes from making more destruction. The safe zone changes randomly in each level, providing you with a fresher, more intense experience each time.

Choose your weapon from gallery or buy them with coins you earned by winning each level. Find them, Shoot & kill them otherwise they will kill you. This survival game is all about battle, fight, strike and attack. Enjoy this fun addictive game with true super hero fighter! Be prepared for any situation. Shoot before the evils hunt you down. Fight to win the battle against the enemies. Experience the most addictive action game. Survive the most dangerous challenges that come your way.

This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!

Last Player Survival : Battlegrounds Features:
• Full of action & thrill packed levels
• High quality 3D graphics with different camera angles
• Smooth & easy controls to play
• Variety of weapons and accessories
• Make best strategy and become real survival hero
• Awesome Animations & Best Sound Effects
• Addictive & Engaging game play
